sentences.english: In this paper studies have been presented on decomposition kinetics of magnesite in Fu shun by thermal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 本文用熱分析對撫順菱鎂礦分解動力學進行了研究。

sentences.english: Light-burned magnesia is prepared by calcining magnesite.
sentences.chinese: 本文通過煅燒菱鎂礦製備輕燒氧化鎂。

sentences.english: The magnesite originated from the peridotite by weathering.
sentences.chinese: 菱鎂礦是由橄欖岩風化形成的。
